trends: There have been no other sightings in Bainbridge twp
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1.Was sitting on the back deck visiting with B-I-L, and checking out the stars. 2.Looking at jupiter, turned and saw a circular (like a falling star but rainbow trail)much larger and the front of it was halfmoon shaped. It was falling fast and when I yelled what the #*$%$* is that, it just vanished before my wife and Brother-in-law could see it. 3.No clue 4.front was halfmoon shaped (like someone took a bite out of a cookie) was streaking NE and was very bright (rainbow colors) 5. I was surprised, never saw anything like that in my life. Then afterwards, thought of what it could have been. Meteorite burning up, a plane dumping fuel, ect. 6. It just vanished.
Summary: was looking at jupiter, turned and saw a circular (like a falling star) but much larger and a rainbow trail, the front of it was halfmoon shaped.
